---
name: image
image_config:
  model_name: test-model
  num_images: 1
  size: 512x512
  aspect_ratio: 1:1
  seed: 12345
input_schema:
  type: image
  properties:
    userMessage:
      type: string
  required:
    - userMessage
---

<System>

You are an image generation model. Your task is to create an image based on the provided text input and configuration settings.
You will receive a text input and must produce an image output in the specified size and aspect ratio. 
Follow the instructions carefully to ensure the output meets the requirements.
</System>
